verses.text: \w About|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w outcry|strong="H6818"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* wives against \w their|strong="H1961"\w* fellow \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

\w Some|strong="H7227"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* saying, “We \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w*. We \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* order \w to|strong="H1121"\w* eat \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stay|strong="H2421"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.”

Others \w were|strong="H3426"\w* saying, “We \w are|strong="H3426"\w* \w mortgaging|strong="H6148"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w homes|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w* during \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.”

Still others \w were|strong="H3426"\w* saying, “We \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w borrowed|strong="H3867"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w pay|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3426"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w tax|strong="H4060"\w* \w on|strong="H4060"\w* \w our|strong="H3426"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.

\w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w just|strong="H6258"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* countrymen \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H6258"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w yet|strong="H6258"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* subjecting \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*. \w Some|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w already|strong="H6258"\w* enslaved, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* powerless \w to|strong="H3027"\w* redeem \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* belong \w to|strong="H3027"\w* others.”

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w outcry|strong="H2201"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w complaints|strong="H1697"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w extremely|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* serious \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w rebuked|strong="H7378"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w*, saying, “\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H1419"\w* \w exacting|strong="H5383"\w* \w usury|strong="H4855"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* own brothers!” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* called \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6952"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*

\w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w We|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w done|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H7069"\w* best \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* back \w our|strong="H7069"\w* \w Jewish|strong="H3064"\w* brothers \w who|strong="H4672"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1471"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w selling|strong="H4376"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* own brothers, \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* back \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w us|strong="H4672"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w remained|strong="H1571"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*, \w for|strong="H4376"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* continued, “\w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w right|strong="H2896"\w*. Shouldn’t \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* avoid \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H6213"\w* foreign enemies?

\w I|strong="H2088"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, \w have|strong="H1571"\w* been \w lending|strong="H5383"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w*. \w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* stop \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w usury|strong="H4855"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* immediately \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w groves|strong="H2132"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, along \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* percentage \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w grain|strong="H1715"\w*, \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* been assessing \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.”

“\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*,” \w they|strong="H1992"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w require|strong="H1245"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w required|strong="H1245"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* nobles \w and|strong="H7725"\w* officials \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w promised|strong="H7650"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shook|strong="H5287"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* folds \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* robe \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w likewise|strong="H1571"\w* \w shake|strong="H5287"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w possessions|strong="H3018"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w promise|strong="H1697"\w*. \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w shaken|strong="H5287"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*!” \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “Amen,” \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Furthermore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w thirty-second|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* (\w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* total), \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* brothers ate \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w heavily|strong="H3513"\w* burdened \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* plus forty \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3947"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* devoted \w myself|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* construction \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H5288"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w acquire|strong="H7069"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w There|strong="H4480"\w* \w were|strong="H1471"\w* 150 \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w besides|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* guests \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Each|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w choice|strong="H1305"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w some|strong="H3117"\w* \w fowl|strong="H6833"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w once|strong="H3117"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w provided|strong="H6213"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w demand|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w burden|strong="H3513"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w favorably|strong="H2896"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
